alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 12:13PM MST until February 24 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM MST THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts to 10 inches. Strong and gusty winds of 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 55 mph will cause areas of blowing snow and reduced visibilities. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties, Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 2 AM MST Thursday morning . * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with poor visibilities in blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The winter storm system has slowed down even more this morning, resulting in more of a delay in the onset and ending of the previous Winter Weather Advisory. The Winter Weather Advisory is now in effect from 4 PM this afternoon to 2 AM MST tonight (Thursday morning).
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio...commercial television or radio stations...or your cable television service provider for updates on this Winter Storm.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
